text: Jayaram Kailas is an Indian film director and ad maker. He started his career as a cameraman for several telefilms and ad films.http://m.dailyhunt.in/news/india/english/cochin-talkies-epaper- cochinta/akkaldhamayile-pennu-movie-review- newsid-46442713http://www.manoramaonline.com/movies/interview/interview-with- jayaram-kailas.html Later he turned to ad filmmaker in UAE.He also direct major stage shows with Indian leading actors in Europe & GCC Countries. Jayaram Kailas made his directional debut with Akkaldhamayile Pennu (2015),http://www.manoramaonline.com/movies/interview/interview-with-jayaram- kailas.html which bagged two film critics awards in 2016.http://www.manoramaonline.com/movies/movie-news/akkaldamayile-pennu- critics- award.htmlhttp://www.newindianexpress.com/entertainment/malayalam/Akkaldamayile- Pennu-Set-to-Release-on- Nov-20/2015/11/18/article3133185.ecehttp://www.newindianexpress.com/entertainment/malayalam/2014/11/25/Her- LifeHer- Woes/article2539016.ecehttp://www.newindianexpress.com/entertainment/malayalam/2017/apr/20/gokul- sureshs-next-pappu--is-a-rom-com-1595533.html He is one among the National Film award jury(INDIA) member 2018.http://pib.nic.in/newsite/PrintRelease.aspx?relid=192564 == Career == Jayaram Kailas holds a diploma in photography. He started an ad film making company in UAE. Within a short span of time, he has amassed an impressive list of clients that include Emirates post UAE,Rak Airways Raz Al Hyma, Al Manama UAE, Index Jewellery Dubai, Gulfgate Hair Fixing GCC & India, Finance house AbuDhabi, Onyx electronics India, and coral builders India.http://www.mathrubhumi.com/mobile/movies-music/preview/akkaldamayile- pennu-malayalam-news-1.676057. == Filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" style="background:#f5f5f5;" |- style="background:#B0C4DE;" !
